d: Wahid is a classic fitted waistcoat.

s.cutFrontFacing.t: The front facing is not shown
s.cutFrontFacing.d:
The **Front facing** (1a) is not shown, but you can trace it from the Front part (1). Trace the outline on the left of the facing/lining boundary that extends from the tip of the dart to the shoulder seam. 

It is not shown because the **expand** core setting is currently disabled. Enable it to show this pattern part.
s.cutFrontLining.t: The front lining is not shown
s.cutFrontLining.d:
The **Front lining** (1b) is not shown, but you can trace it from the Front part (1). Trace the outline on the right of the facing/lining boundary that extends from the tip of the dart to the shoulder seam. 

It is not shown because the **expand** core setting is currently disabled. Enable it to show this pattern part.
s.cutPocketWelt.t: The pocket welt is not shown
s.cutPocketWelt.d:
The **Pocket welt** (3) is a rectangular piece of fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long (this part does not use seam allowance). 

It is not shown because the **expand** core setting is currently disabled. Enable it to show this pattern part.
s.noBackDart.t: The back dart is not necessary
s.noBackDart.d:
Your measurements indicate that a back dart is not necessary, so you can skip this part of the instructions. 

Some manual adjustments might be necessary if the chest size measurement is much smaller than the waist and hip size.
s.cutPocketInterfacing.t: The pocket interfacing is not shown
s.cutPocketInterfacing.d:
The **Pocket interfacing** (6) is a rectangular piece of fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long (this part does not use seam allowance). 

It is not shown because the **expand** core setting is currently disabled. Enable it to show this pattern part.

backScyeDart.d: The amount to take out in a dart at the back of the armhole.

frontScyeDart.d: The amount to take out in a dart at the front of the armhole.

pocketLocation.d: Determines the placement of the pocket

pocketWidth.d: Determines the width of the pocket

weltHeight.d: Determines the height of the welt

necklineDrop.d: Determines how low the neckline drops at the front

frontStyle.classic.d: Draft a waistcoat with a classic V-shaped neck opening

frontStyle.rounded.d: Draft a waistcoat with a rounded V-shaped neck opening

hemStyle.classic.d: Draft a waistcoat with a classic cut-away hem style

hemStyle.rounded.d: Draft a waistcoat with a rounded hem style

hemStyle.square.d: Draft a waistcoat with with straight hem

hemRadius.d: Radius by which the hem is rounded

backInset.d: How much the back of the armhole is cut inwards

frontInset.d: How much the front of the armhole is cut inwards

shoulderInset.d: How much the shoulder seam is cut inwards at the shoulder

neckInset.d: How much the shoulder seam is cut inwards at the neck

buttons.d: The amount of buttons to use.

waistEase.d: Controls the amount of ease at the waist.

hipsEase.d: Controls the amount of ease at the hips.

centerBackDart.d: Whether or not to include a center back dart to fit a rounded back.
